con:testCase.name: OTA-4392 Status change - from blocked to active

con:testStep.name: [Pre-Condition] Generate Access Token For Technical User

con:restRequest.name: PRE - create CampaignSet

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def slurper = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def releaseNotesId = slurper.releaseNotesId
log.info releaseNotesId context.testCase.setPropertyValue('releaseNotesID', releaseNotesId)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def slurper = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def releaseNotesId = slurper.releaseNotesId
log.info releaseNotesId assert releaseNotesId != null context.testCase.setPropertyValue('releaseNotesID', releaseNotesId)

con:config.service: ESR Labs ORU App - Vehicle Configuration

con:assertion.name: Status Line is equal to "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content"
